mapper.insert: insert into CashTrans (TraSn, UsrSn, PayTime, PaySrc, CashPayAmount, Currency, CreditPerUnit, CreateTime) values (#{trasn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashpayamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditperunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update CashTrans set UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PayTime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PaySrc = #{paysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CashPayAmount = #{cashpayamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreditPerUnit = #{creditperunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TraSn = #{trasn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TraSn, UsrSn, PayTime, PaySrc, CashPayAmount, Currency, CreditPerUnit, CreateTime from CashTrans
